Description.Text: Perla Casino & Hotel is a stylish 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Nova Gorica. Highlights include three restaurants, free Wi-Fi and parking, a large casino and a spa. Nova Gorica is a peaceful town situated in western Slovenia at the Italian border. It is notable for its modern casinos and green outdoor spaces. Nearby places of interest include the Regional Museum, Kostanjevica Monastery and the magnificent Sveta Gora, where travellers can enjoy exceptional views overlooking the region. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Nova Gorica destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary high-rise building with a striking facade. Facilities include a large 24-hour casino with table games, slot machines, a poker room and an outdoor games area. There is also a spa with an indoor swimming pool, private treatment rooms, two Jacuzzis, four saunas and a gym. The Arena hosts live entertainment daily. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are 22sqm and decorated in a modern style with warm colours and dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen cable/satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and air-conditioning. Waterbeds are available on request. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Calypso offers local and Mediterranean dishes and fine wines in an elegant dining room, while Mediterraneo serves Mediterranean cuisine, specialising in seafood dishes. Oceanis offers a range of buffet dishes and Caffe Dolce Vita serves tea, coffee, snacks and desserts. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the Discotheque which boasts DJs every evening. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
